--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Stirling, Scott" 
<scott.stirling@w...> wrote:
> If you can, run your tests from Ant using the <batchtest> sub-task 
of the <junit> task and set both tasks to fork="true".  This will 
fire off each test method in its own JVM.
> 
> Scott Stirling
> Workscape
